title: Self-Directed Competency Enhancement for Pre-Service Teachers in Foreign Language (Chinese) Education (TCFL) Using Smart Educational Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese grammar and vocabulary knowledge, general understanding of foreign language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to cultivate intercultural communication skills using smart education tools (Moso Teach, Rain Classroom, etc.) and develop integrated instructional design capabilities combining technology, pedagogy, content knowledge, and social skills

learning_goals: Using smart education tools, learners can design three or more Chinese language education scenarios that reflect cultural contexts
Applying features of Moso Teach (RC) and Rain Classroom (RC), learners can develop five or more types of interactive language learning activities
Learners can implement three or more technology-integrated strategies to facilitate interaction among large learner groups in online learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
